quick_prompts: Find the best way to get to Tokyo in business class
Which card should I apply for next?
Is this award a good value?

sample_conversation.message: I have 80K Chase UR and want Tokyo in business class. Options?

Top options: 1) Transfer to United (70K-88K miles RT, CPP 2.8-3.5¢). 2) Transfer to Virgin Atlantic to book ANA (55K one-way, CPP 5.0-7.0¢). Recommendation: Virgin Atlantic for best value if availability exists.
